name: Cactus Mayhem
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 53 : Oasis in72 hours.

The limitation was: Game must have permadeath.

Controls:
  • WASD: move
  • LMB: shoot
  • Scroll wheel: change attack
  • Space: jump
  • E: activate
  • Left shift: run
  • P: pause

Future post-Jam additions:
  • two new enemies: the camel and the lion (boss)
  • more sounds and particles 
  • a basic progression system
